title: Tunisian brik
ingredients: ['2 large sweet potatoes', 'vegetable oil', '450g lamb mince', '1 large white onion, sliced', '1 teaspoon coriander (or more, to taste)', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', 'chilli powder, to taste', 'ground cumin, to taste', '1 knob butter', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 spring onions, chopped', '1 large egg', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 pack filo pastry']
